title: Weimaraner
summary: The Weimaraner (/ˈwaɪmərɑːnər/ VY-mə-rah-nər) is a large dog that was originally bred as a hunting dog in the early 19th century.[3] Early Weimaraners were used by royalty for hunting large game such as boar, bear and deer. As the popularity of large game hunting began to decline, Weimaraners were used for hunting smaller animals like fowl, rabbits and foxes.
